sentence: “That election was rotten to the core,” Congressman Paul Gosar told the crowd.
author: Towleroad
title: Election fraud belief undimmed for Trump fans, despite party hopes

sentence: Those are the acceptable sins, respectively, of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, Lauren Boebart, Matt Gaetz, and Paul Gosar.
author: Wajahat Ali
title: Sorry, Mitch McConnell. Frankenstein’s Monster Runs the GOP Now

sentence: Republicans immediately derided Biden’s pledge to nominate a Black woman to the Supreme Court – while Democratic leaders are hoping for bipartisan support; House Speaker Nancy Pelosi insists the nation needs a strong Republican party – meanwhile radicals like Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, who fantasize about committing acts of violence against Democrats, are embraced by fellow Republicans, proving they are not just a extremist fringe that has “hijacked” the Party, as Pelosi suggested.
author: Thomas Zimmer
title: The Republican party is abandoning democracy. There can be no ‘politics as usual’

sentence: Republicans immediately derided Biden’s pledge to nominate a Black woman to the Supreme Court – while Democratic leaders are hoping for bipartisan support; House Speaker Nancy Pelosi insists the nation needs a strong Republican party – meanwhile radicals like Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, who fantasize about committing acts of violence against Democrats, are embraced by fellow Republicans, proving they are not just a extremist fringe that has 'hijacked' the Party, as Pelosi suggested."
author: Bob Brigham
title: Biden needs to stop seeking bipartisanship as Republicans abandon democracy: historian

sentence: “Meanwhile, radicals like Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, who fantasize about committing acts of violence against Democrats, are embraced by fellow Republicans, proving they are not just an extremist fringe that has ‘hijacked’ the Party, as Pelosi suggested.” The history professor concludes his op-ed on a disturbing note, arguing that Democrats are being naïve if they underestimate the “radicalization” of the 2022 GOP.
author: Alex Henderson
title: There can be no ‘politics as usual’ when ‘radicalized’ Republicans reject democracy itself: historian

sentence: McConnell issued a statement in response to reports that Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene of Georgia and Paul Gosar of Arizona addressed the America First Political Action Conference (AFPAC) in Orlando, Fla.
author: Jonathan Edwards and Mariana Alfaro
title: McConnell: No space in GOP for 'white supremacists or anti-Semitism' after two House Republicans attend in white nationalist's conferene

sentence: "There's no place in the Republican Party for white supremacists or antisemitism," McConnell told Politico, when asked to comment on Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar's attendance at the America First Political Action Conference.
author: Natalie Colarossi
title: Mitch McConnell Condemns GOP Members Who Engage With White Nationalists

sentence: McCarthy, R-Calif., said he plans to speak with the Georgia Republican and Rep. Paul Gosar, who spoke at the event last year and appeared this year in a 30-second pre-recorded video.
author: Morgan Phillips
title: 'Appalling and wrong': Mitch McConnell and Kevin McCarthy slam Marjorie Taylor Greene for appearing alongside white supremacist

sentence: After GOP Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar both spoke at a white nationalist event in Orlando over the weekend, GOP leaders were quick to condemn their attendance.
author: Sky Palma
title: GOP leaders condemn Greene and Gosar for appearing at white nationalist event – but it's not enough: op-ed

sentence: Republican House leader Kevin McCarthy has been called “toothless” for inadequately dealing with Reps Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar after their appearance at a white nationalist event.
author: Gino Spocchia
title: ‘Toothless’ McCarthy vows to ‘talk to’ Marjorie Taylor Greene over her appearance at white nationalist event

sentence: McCarthy on Monday called the America First Political Action Conference “appalling” and said “there’s no place in our party for any of this,” but on Tuesday he declined to say whether House Republicans would sanction Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.) or Rep. Paul Gosar (R-Ariz.) for participating, though he said he would have a talk with them.
author: Igor Bobic
title: Kevin McCarthy Dodges On Punishing Members Over White Nationalist Conference

sentence: GOP leaders in the House and the Senate on Monday denounced a pair of far-right Trump allies — Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., and Paul Gosar, R-Ariz. — for speaking at a gathering of white nationalists in Florida over the weekend.
author: Steve Benen
title: Republican leaders offer incomplete rebukes of Greene and Gosar

sentence: McCarthy told a CNN reporter on Monday that it was “appalling and wrong” for Republican Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., and Paul Gosar, R-Ariz., to speak to the annual America First Political Action Conference, or AFPAC.

title: AFPAC Versus America Last GOP

sentence: “Can’t they take their Twitter accounts away, too?” The Times notes that among those pushing the 2020 election conspiracy theories is Boebert as well as other members like Reps. Paul Gosar, Andy Biggs, Mo Brooks, Matt Gaetz, Madison Cawthorn, and Marjorie Taylor Greene.
